Karen Hampton bụ onye America na-ese ihe na-ese onyinyo nke na-emepụta ọrụ nka nkè e bu n'obi ịkwụnye na mgbidi, na "ihe osise a na-eyi" gụnyere akwa na jaket. Hampton na-emepụta ákwà nkè ya site na iji usoro imepụta ihe dị ichè íchè nke gụnyere batik (stamping na stampụ ọla kọpa), rozome, silk-screening, mbipụta ihuenyo, discharging na over dyeing, na felting

Ọ na-emepụta ákwà site na iji usoro ọnwụ "snow" ma na-emepụta ihe osise dijitalụ / nke a na-egbuke egbuke. Na mgbakwunye na akwa akwa, Hampton na-eji usoro ịkwa akwa dịgasị ichè íchè iji mepụta ihe mkpuchi mgbidi, dị ka Korean pojagi patchwork.  
Hampton bụ ónyé Indiana Artisan, aha nsọpụrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe na ndị omenkà na-anọchite anya steeti nyèrè. Ọ bụkwa ónyé otu Studio Art Quilt Associates, Surface Design Association, na International Quilt Association.
